result.html: bhí siad san armThey were in the army.
result.ponchtml: ḃí siad san armThey were in the army.

result.eng: A spell in the army will do you good.
result.ga: déanfaidh seal san arm maitheas duit
result.orig: déanfaidh seal san arm maitheas duit
result.html: déanfaidh seal san arm maitheas duitA spell in the army will do you good.
result.ponchtml: déanfaiḋ seal san arm maiṫeas duitA spell in the army will do you good.

result.eng: He enlisted in the army when he was 18 years of age.
result.ga: liostáil sé san arm nuair a bhí sé 18 bliain d'aois
result.orig: liostáil sé san arm nuair a bhí sé 18 bliain d'aois
result.html: liostáil sé san arm nuair a bhí sé 18 bliain d'aoisHe enlisted in the army when he was 18 years of age.
result.ponchtml: liostáil sé san arm nuair a ḃí sé 18 bliain d'aoisHe enlisted in the army when he was 18 years of age.

result.eng: The waged war on the king's army to acquire the temple.
result.ga: chuir siad cogadh ar arm an rí chun seilbh a fháil ar an teampall
result.orig: chuir siad cogadh ar arm an rí chun seilbh a fháil ar an teampall
result.html: chuir siad cogadh ar arm an rí chun seilbh a fháil ar an teampallThe waged war on the king's army to acquire the temple.
result.ponchtml: ċuir siad cogaḋ ar arm an rí ċun seilḃ a ḟáil ar an teampallThe waged war on the king's army to acquire the temple.
